title: Laughing Fish's 50k lifetime upvote spectacular!
body:
EDIT: Due to the large number of gifs, it may take a moment for this page to load correctly. Please give it a moment.

Greetings loved ones and fellow summoners! It is I, The Laughing Fish, here with a message: I have just hit 50,000 lifetime upvotes! 
http://i.imgur.com/xuYSdHN.png
To celebrate this momentous occasion, I have decided to make a list of my top 10 gifs!!

#Number 10: 
The relationship struggle that every ADC and Support go though.
http://25.media.tumblr.com/0ec64a5f06eb32060c7f6146ff17f29f/tumblr_mzq53kFaF31qgvse2o1_250.gif
https://33.media.tumblr.com/f747393dced3a0bc4fdb8d5f6dcd3edb/tumblr_mzq53kFaF31qgvse2o2_400.gif

#Number 9:
When you are trying to get people to upgrade their trinkets
http://www.theloop.ca/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/mal5l.gif

#Number 8:
When you win a 70 min+ game
http://i.imgur.com/PvewX1W.gif

#Number 7 (This was 6 months ago. It is no longer true, as the Lore team has been on a roll lately)
Rito writing the new lore
http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140505101559/nickfanon/images/a/a6/Spongebob-essay-o.gif
http://38.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m5acjstDAu1qddo8m.gif

#Number 6:
When you are the jungler, and every lane begins to fall simultaneously
http://wanna-joke.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/loop-gif-fire-problem.gif

#Number 5:
Should the next champion be an ADC or a jungler?
http://img-9gag-fun.9cache.com/photo/anBvNxz_460sa.gif

#Number 4:
How it feels to get fed as a juggernaut
http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/634/688/78a.gif

#Number 3:
When your game stops lagging
https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-BX_JAtKw3cU/VdKDOUJBF5I/AAAAAAAA7Q8/cYr1uQo5VrM/s426/oie_GmHrGmkb4qJg.gif

#Number 2:
 When someone on the enemy team is very likable.
http://media.giphy.com/media/Z2UvoBxaABE3e/giphy.gif

#NUMBER ONE:
What every support must deal with
https://33.media.tumblr.com/0c14b8758581f17bc6b180551101e142/tumblr_nwvdoveont1qzpsr9o1_400.gif?Noredirect

This concludes my top 10 list! It has certainly been a fun last several months. Thank you everyone for your continued support!  
One more thing: If this post gets more upvotes then the 40k spectacular (431 upvotes), then I will give out a free champions to the most liked, and a free skin to a random commenter!

replies.body:
Yay~

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

*hides* Senpai saw me.


http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fi2.kym-cdn.com%2Fphotos%2Fimages%2Fnewsfeed%2F000%2F230%2F878%2Ff31.gif&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425&height=800
http://hectormadrigal.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/ninja-turtles-noticing.gif
http://www.tinygif.com/data/media/13/predator-i-see-you.gif

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Laughing Fish gives a Godzilla gif, everyone comments on it and praises him.
I do it, and I get maybe _three_ upvotes.

The struggle is indeed real.

The key is not to post *a* godzilla gif, but post a lot of godzilla gifs. 
http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/godzilla/images/b/bc/Kaiju_Caramelldansen_-_1_-_Godzilla_1954.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140928235852
numbah 3 the feels
http://i37.photobucket.com/albums/e85/flirtykuki/KND%20Folder/KukiWallyGLOMP.gif

That Godzilla one was numero uno in my book! 
How I imagine Laughing Fish most days:
https://images.rapgenius.com/ecb1350031a0438ff8050dd9deb3601d.500x212x28.gif
You're not funny
http://gifstumblr.com/images/im-not-always-as-confident-as-i-look_206.gif

I agree with everything you just said.
http://gifsec.com/wp-content/uploads/GIF/2014/08/GIF-Agree-I-agree-Have-to-agree-GIF.gif?gs=a

Here's to the 51K.
http://i.imgur.com/ZdgL9df.gif

Edit: Wrong GIF,put the right one now .-.
http://media.giphy.com/media/g5PgP4sr09vd6/giphy.gif
I feel like #10 should be higher. That one is one of the few that I keep bookmarked to this day because of how funny it is.
Indeed, that is my favorite as well. But I have them listed by number of upvotes, and that is only my 10th most popular.
brb making like 30 accounts to upvote that post.

We need to find a way to make you immortal. That way you can continue to brighten the world with your GIF's
Also Have a Jinx Sticker Good Sir, {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
http://postcron.com/en/blog/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Thats-the-spirit.gif

I think this is applicable to a lot us (or at least me):

https://i.gyazo.com/5fe10dd9c7a25fbcbba2d14df171c2a7.png

Just take my hand, and together we shall rule a new empire of memes and gifs.
http://i.imgur.com/e3fz0HT.gif?Noredirect
http://i.imgur.com/Ccp84b1.gif?nodirect
http://i.imgur.com/qtvmI6w.gif?Noredirect

Laughing Fish! Was it last month that you hit your 40k upvotes? I always get so excited when I see you in a thread, because I know that funny gifs are incoming :D You probably don't remember me, but you taught me how you find gifs (because I'm a super noob) I hope to continue to learn the ways of gif posting greatness from you Mr. Laughing Fish! 
Teach me like you would a brother!
https://media.giphy.com/media/tFKSxaEvuetZS/giphy.gif

Congratulations, Laughing Fish!

Now gives us the free skinz!!!!
 http://i.imgur.com/DHf8oUH.gif)]

LaughingFish right now:
http://i.imgur.com/OLwoQsj.gif
https://media.riffsy.com/images/0d6b114d7acf14facdc34dc1267f809b/raw
Thank you for spamming the front page with stuff that is super useful to league. I love the new memes and games league forum you helped create.

Everyone who sees a Laughing Fish post

http://i.imgur.com/gdAqzdU.gif"

Keep it up, man!
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/spongebob/images/7/75/Over_9000.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150718224913"

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} CONGRATULATIONS! NEVER GIVE UP!



If you EVER stop though... Memes & Games would NEVER be the same... {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
You could say never gif up.
3, 5 , and 10 i've never seen before and like them. however 1 is still my favorite.
http://38.media.tumblr.com/53393a795a248f94b5903f90dfa97d7e/tumblr_mz5t4fvtXK1rdh9azo1_400.gif
my face when my adc has less than 90 hp after i heal them and they dive a 200 hp enemy under tower {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Hi, I'm MoonMoon. Came from the moon, eating noodles with a spoon, dinner came too soon, life is like a balloon, if you pop it with a harpoon, you'll turn into a racoon.

Poem inspired by the internet, dedicated to LaughingFish because why not. Now it'll disappear with the rest of the comments here.

PS: Don't underestimate microwaves.

I know no one wants the free skin so i guess ill have to bite the bullet...   

http://gifsec.com/wp-content/uploads/GIF/2014/04/Pick-me-gif.gif?gs=a
I know the feeling of looking through posts on the boards, then seeing a laughing fish post and being like: {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Can we go ALL the way back to Laughing Fish's first actual post on the boards? Let us cringe if it's cringe worthy.
https://images.rapgenius.com/54b2a67a52b693e4765dce7f25136bbb.500x200x20.gif
Godzilla and the deer one made my day. Thank you!

The circle of luaghing fish continues, he will post gifs and we will read them

Congratulations man! And thanks for the opportunity to use a sticker!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Number one always gets me XD
YAYY!!!!(I'm on mobile so can't gif you right now)

*a random commenter*

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Laughing Fish, Laughing Fish, Laughing Fish. I suspected you were going upvote crazy when I say your 40K spectacular. I haven't been on since then, and decided to do a quick post about the new Champ select, and what do I find? My god man, have you gone mad? Last time I gave you a slap of encouragement, but this time I won't go so easy on you.
https://38.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lllumr95qg1qd4jmyo1_400.gif
